description: Works to the following Trees (see attached Tree Survey and Plan)  T1, T2, T4, T5, T6 and T8 (Tilia Cordata - Small Leaved Lime Trees) Remove deadwood from crown. Crown Lift to 4m.  T3 ( Quercus Robur - Common Oak Tree) - Remove epicormic from mainstem. Cut back by 3m clearance. T7 & T9  (Platanus X Hispanica, London Plane Trees) -  Crown lift to six metres. Reduce Eastern side to give 2.5m clearance from building T10, T11 ( Tilia Cordata - Small Leaved Lime Trees) -   Re-pollard on a 3 yearly cycle remove epicormic growth. T12, T13, T14, T15 ( Tilia Cordata -Small Leaved Trees) - Remove epicormic growth. Crown lift to 3m T16 - (Tilia Cordata  -Small-leaved Lime Tree) - Remove deadwood from Crown and monitor.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
site_name: St Clements Hospital, 2 Bow Road, London
